name: Meowximum Catpacity
description:
Made for Train Jam 2016 by five cat-loving developers, in around 52 hours while riding a train from Chicago to San Francisco!

Thanks and well wishes go out to all our fellow jammers and the Amtrak train crew!

Extra special thanks to Adriel Wallick and John Lindvay for organising the event!

Controls:

  • See the Mewtorial in game for keyboard controls, you can play with a friend!
  • Try your luck in 4-player mode by connecting 4 gamepads, it should work, but we never got a chance to test it!

Best played at 1440 x 900 resolution.
